requirements.summary: Remove only the four specified Settings UI elements (header/title area and specific labels/inputs) without changing any other UI.
acceptanceCriteria: The element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[1]/div[1] is no longer rendered.
The element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/input[1] is no longer rendered.
The element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[1]/label[1] is no longer rendered.
The element at XPath /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[3]/div[2]/div[2]/label[1] is no longer rendered.
No other UI elements outside the four selected XPaths are changed.

file_operations.description: Update the SettingsCard JSX to stop rendering exactly the four selected elements: (1) remove the Settings card header/title area element (the selected header/title wrapper at the provided XPath) while leaving other Settings card content untouched, (2) remove the first settings input (App Name input), (3) remove the first settings label (App Name label), and (4) remove the second settings label (Helpline Phone label). Do not change any other Settings UI structure/text beyond what is strictly necessary for these removals; keep user-facing text in English.
